location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Aboo [Ābu] to Major Charles Kenneth Mackenzie Walter

mods.abstract: Letter accepting an invitation from Walter to visit Jodhpore [Jodhpur] and see the ceremonials and arranging his travel and itinerary for the visit.The letter also approves arranging an elephant ceremony in place of a carriage ceremony if the Maharajah would prefer it and thanking Walter and recognising all his work in Rajpootana [Rājasthān].
